pullRequest.body:
This PR shows that `a ≤ algebraMap ℝ A ‖a‖` for a self-adjoint element `a : A` of a C*-algebra.

---

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they

nodes.body:
Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9278697327/job/25530102821)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9278697327/job/25530102578)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9278697327/job/25530102938)
I think the non-unital version has to wait for a week or so.
I think the non-unital version has to wait for a week or so.

Can we transfer all these results into a new file? I would prefer the `Instances` file to contain pretty much only the bare minimum necessary to get the instances (some things can probably even be moved out of this file).

Can you add this too?
```lean
- (algebraMap ℝ A ‖a‖) ≤ a
```

Also, can we get the non-unital version? That is, `{a : A} (ha : IsSelfAdjoint a) (b : A) : star b * a * b ≤ ‖a‖ • star b * b`? You can prove it by passing to the unitization. (It's possible you need mine an Anatole's work first, in which case we can leave it to a future PR.)
I'll try it and see how it goes.
I'll take your word for it and leave it for another PR.

Unless you think this is a bad idea for some reason
```suggestion
lemma le_algebraMap_of_spectrum_le {r : R} {a : A} (h : ∀ x ∈ spectrum R a, x ≤ r)
```

```suggestion
lemma algebraMap_le_of_le_spectrum {r : R} {a : A} (h : ∀ x ∈ spectrum R a, r ≤ x)
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: a self-adjoint element of a C*-algebra is upper bounded by the algebra map of its norm
